title: Fragment, 16th century
creditline: Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf
description: Light brown velvet, cut and uncut, with a cream-colored ground in fan shaped motifs between horizontal zigzag bars.
